ComicInfo.Penciller: Hi-Fi,Neal Adams,Paulo Siqueira,Yanick Paquette,Paulo Siqueira,Geraldo Borges
ComicInfo.Summary: Titans Hunt, Chapter Five: Sticks and Stones: Nightwing, Donna, and Garth look for answers in Hatton Corners before heading off into the woods in search of a monster. Meanwhile, Lilith meets with Dawn Granger just before Hawk, Roy Harper, and Gnarrk tear apart her office and Karen has an odd encounter with Neil Richards while waiting at the hospital for word about her husband, who is elsewhere being forced to do the bidding of Mister Twister.
